byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: MOSCOW, March 1--The Soviet press features three columns of a Tass News Agency dispatch from Washington entitled "The second volume of the secret documents of former Secretary of State Robert Lansing."...

headline.main: TASS ASSERTS LANSING TRIED TO BALK SOVIET; Russian News Agency Says Papers Show 'Plot'

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, March 1--The Soviet press features three columns of a Tass News Agency dispatch from Washington entitled "The second volume of the secret documents of former Secretary of State Robert Lansing."
